title: Special Education Teacher In US Charged With Sexually Assaulting Student
content: She was arrested after an investigation revealed that she allegedly began sexually abusing her student earlier this year.
summary: She was arrested after an investigation revealed that she allegedly began sexually abusing her student earlier this year.

title: S Jaishankar Discusses Trade, Technology, Global Issues With Qatar's PM
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Sunday met Qatar's PM Mohammed bin Abdulrahman bin Jassim Al Thani and reviewed bilateral relationship, with a focus on political, trade, investment, energy, technology, culture and people-to-people ties.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Sunday met Qatar's PM Mohammed bin Abdulrahman bin Jassim Al Thani and reviewed bilateral relationship, with a focus on political, trade, investment, energy, technology, culture and people-to-people ties.

title: "Swarm" Of Ukrainian Drones Attack Russian Steel Mill In Overnight Raid
content: A "swarm" of Ukrainian drones targeted Russian steelmaker Novolipetsk Steel's facility in a raid in the early hours of Sunday, but it sustained no serious damage, a company spokesperson said.
summary: A "swarm" of Ukrainian drones targeted Russian steelmaker Novolipetsk Steel's facility in a raid in the early hours of Sunday, but it sustained no serious damage, a company spokesperson said.

title: "Hostile State Actors": UK Warns Of Russian Interference In General Polls
content: Britain's deputy prime minister warned Sunday that the country's upcoming general election faces threats from hostile actors such as Russia seeking to influence the UK's democratic process.
summary: Britain's deputy prime minister warned Sunday that the country's upcoming general election faces threats from hostile actors such as Russia seeking to influence the UK's democratic process.

title: 5 Lankan Fishermen Consume Contents Found In Bottle Floating In Sea, Die
content: Five Sri Lankan fishermen who had consumed the contents in a bottle floating in the sea on Saturday had died by Sunday afternoon, Navy Spokesman Captain Gayan Wickramasuriya said.
summary: Five Sri Lankan fishermen who had consumed the contents in a bottle floating in the sea on Saturday had died by Sunday afternoon, Navy Spokesman Captain Gayan Wickramasuriya said.

title: Part Of Rocket Crashes In China During Test, Says Space Pioneer
content: Beijing Tianbing Technology Co said on Sunday that the first stage of its Tianlong-3 rocket under development had detached from its launch pad during a test due to structural failure and landed in a hilly area of the city of Gongyi in central China.
summary: Beijing Tianbing Technology Co said on Sunday that the first stage of its Tianlong-3 rocket under development had detached from its launch pad during a test due to structural failure and landed in a hilly area of the city of Gongyi in central China.

title: 3 Hezbollah Members Killed In Israeli Strike On Lebanese Village: Report
content: Three Hezbollah members were killed on Sunday in an Israeli airstrike in the southeast village of Houla, a media report said.
summary: Three Hezbollah members were killed on Sunday in an Israeli airstrike in the southeast village of Houla, a media report said.

title: Man Rapes 10-Year-Old Boy In Pak, Films Assault, Circulates Video: Report
content: A man allegedly raped a 10-year-old boy in Pakistan's Muzaffargarh, filmed the assault, and circulated the videos on social media to blackmail the child, the Dawn newspaper reported.
summary: A man allegedly raped a 10-year-old boy in Pakistan's Muzaffargarh, filmed the assault, and circulated the videos on social media to blackmail the child, the Dawn newspaper reported.

title: Heavy Battles, Bombardment Hit Gaza City Shujaiya For Fourth Day
content: Heavy battles and bombardment hit Gaza City's Shujaiya district for a fourth day on Sunday, months after the Israeli army declared Hamas's command structure dismantled in the northern area.
summary: Heavy battles and bombardment hit Gaza City's Shujaiya district for a fourth day on Sunday, months after the Israeli army declared Hamas's command structure dismantled in the northern area.

title: US Rapper Kanye West In Moscow Amid Concert Buzz: Report
content: US rapper Kanye West was in Moscow, Russian media reported on Sunday quoting a well-known Russian producer.
summary: US rapper Kanye West was in Moscow, Russian media reported on Sunday quoting a well-known Russian producer.

title: 7 Dead As Ferocious Storms, Heavy Rain Lash France, Switzerland, Italy
content: Ferocious storms and torrential rains that lashed France, Switzerland and Italy this weekend have left seven people dead, local authorities said on Sunday.
summary: Ferocious storms and torrential rains that lashed France, Switzerland and Italy this weekend have left seven people dead, local authorities said on Sunday.

title: High Turnout As France Votes In Election As Far Right Eyes Power
content: French voters flocked to the polls on Sunday in the first round of a snap parliamentary election that could usher in the country's first far-right government since World War Two, a potential sea change at the heart of the European Union.
summary: French voters flocked to the polls on Sunday in the first round of a snap parliamentary election that could usher in the country's first far-right government since World War Two, a potential sea change at the heart of the European Union.

title: Be Ready For "Younger, Tested" Replacement, Nikki Haley Warns Republicans
content: Former South Carolina Governor Nikki Haley claimed that US President Joe Biden will be replaced by a "younger" and more "vibrant" candidate.
summary: Former South Carolina Governor Nikki Haley claimed that US President Joe Biden will be replaced by a "younger" and more "vibrant" candidate.

title: Trump Puts Murdered Women Center Stage To Target Biden On Immigration
content: Minutes before going on stage for the first presidential debate on Thursday, Donald Trump received a phone call from the mother of 12-year-old Jocelyn Nungaray, who was killed in Houston this month, allegedly by two Venezuelan men in the U.S. illegal

title: Rishi Sunak, Keir Starmer Hit Temple Trail To Woo British Hindu Voters
content: On the final weekend of campaigning ahead of the UK general election on Thursday, both Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and the man who is fighting for his job at 10 Downing Street - Labour Leader Keir Starmer, have hit the temple trail to woo British Hind

title: 1 Dead, 5 Injured As Gunmen Open Fire At Wedding Ceremony In France
content: One person was killed and five others wounded in northeastern France when several masked gunmen opened fire at a wedding ceremony, police sources said on Sunday.
summary: One person was killed and five others wounded in northeastern France when several masked gunmen opened fire at a wedding ceremony, police sources said on Sunday.

title: Explained: What Will Happen If Joe Biden Decided To Leave Presidential Race
content: US President Joe Biden's first presidential debate of the US Election against Republican nominee Donald Trump made all the wrong noises.
summary: US President Joe Biden's first presidential debate of the US Election against Republican nominee Donald Trump made all the wrong noises.

title: UK Reform Leader Speech Interrupted By Banner Mocking Putin Views
content: A speech being delivered by Nigel Farage, the leader of Britain's right-wing Reform UK party, was interrupted late Saturday when a banner of Russian President Vladimir Putin descended from the ceiling at an election rally.
summary: A speech being delivered by Nigel Farage, the leader of Britain's right-wing Reform UK party, was interrupted late Saturday when a banner of Russian President Vladimir Putin descended from the ceiling at an election rally.

title: Explained: What Is France's Snap Election, How Does It Work, What Next
content: France holds the first round of parliamentary elections on Sunday. Opinion polls show the far right could win the two-round legislative vote that concludes on July 7.
summary: France holds the first round of parliamentary elections on Sunday. Opinion polls show the far right could win the two-round legislative vote that concludes on July 7.

title: North Korean Officials Wear Pins With "Friendly Father" Kim Jong Un's Face
content: North Korean officials wore pins with a portrait of Kim Jong Un in public for the first time in pictures released by state media on Sunday, the latest step in the development of a cult of personality about the leader.
summary: North Korean officials wore pins with a portrait of Kim Jong Un in public for the first time in pictures released by state media on Sunday, the latest step in the development of a cult of personality about the leader.
